[DomFlow](http://www.domflow.it), brand of [SeFlow](http://www.seflow.net) reputable dedicated italian provider, founded in 2004, is happy to announce new .EU domain August sale.

As .eu accredited registrar we can guarantee you best price avaiable in the market.

[Register or transfer](http://www.domflow.it/orderdomain.php) your .EU domain with promo code: DOMFLOW-EU-CRAZY and get € 4.10 fixed price!

Price will be fixed for next domain renew, no hidden costs

Some Other Promos:
.CLUB €6.50
.ORG €3.99 (only registration)
.BIZ €4.99 (only registration)


We offer a FREE reseller program [http://www.domflow.it/domreseller.php](http://www.domflow.it/domreseller.php)

Get [our WHMCS addon](http://www.domflow.it/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=25) for free or use [our APIs](http://www.domflow.it/domapi.php)

[http://www.domflow.it](http://www.domflow.it)
